#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. Let’s not confuse technology with its uses. Let’s have the debate.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. Is that even really you reading these tweets? With SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers your #online #identity and your online transactions can be secured.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. Is the person picking up a #prescription at a #hospital #pharmacy the right patient or is it a mix-up? With SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers the patient can be safely and securely linked to the prescription.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. Is the person trying to rent and drive away a #RideSharing car the accredited user of the app or their fifteen-year-old kid? With SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers unauthorised users can be refused access.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. Is the teenager wandering #school grounds during the day late for class or a high-risk individual known to the authorities? With SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers you can ignore one and alert to the other.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. Would you want a police officer to recognise an elderly relative with #dementia or #mentalhealth issues out alone on the street and handle them sensitively? With SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers they can.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. Is a twelve-year old child wandering the concourse of a railway station out with their family or a reported #runaway? With SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers missing children can be identified immediately.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. If every #casino and #betting shop in the UK could identify self-excluders to prevent them placing bets at counters or on machines that would be welcomed. With SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers they can.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. Would you get into an app-hailed taxi if the driver wasn’t insured, accredited or background checked? Without SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers you don't know if the driver is actually the person logged into the app.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. If a police officer could memorise thousands of faces of people of interest or vulnerable individuals to become more effective that would be welcomed. With a #bodycam from @DigitalBarriers they can.

#FacialRecognition can be a safeguard not a threat. SmartVis from @DigitalBarriers is staggeringly accurate because it works in #AI and video instead of still images. At 15 frames per second we get 15 chances a second to check and recheck our calculations.
